News.Title: Crown Lifters Hires Bizmoat Global for Business Review
News.Summary: Crown Lifters has engaged Bizmoat Global to conduct a review of their business changes and processes. This suggests the company is taking steps to evaluate and potentially improve its operations.

News.Title: Crown Lifters Reports Improved Q3 EBITDA and Margin
News.Summary: Crown Lifters has announced its Q3 financial results, showing significant year-over-year improvements. The company's EBITDA increased from 38 million rupees to 54 million rupees. Additionally, the EBITDA margin expanded from 52.55% to 61.95%, indicating enhanced operational efficiency.

News.Title: Crown Lifters Reports Strong Q3 Financial Performance
News.Summary: Crown Lifters has announced its financial results for the third quarter. The company's net profit increased significantly to 26 million rupees, up from 14 million rupees in the same period last year. Revenue also saw growth, rising to 87 million rupees from 72 million rupees year-over-year.
